name: Adaptive Randomization Engine
purpose: Implement real-time Bayesian updating for dose-escalation trials to improve patient allocation.

risks.description: Complex design may delay IRB approvals.
risks.mitigation: Publish methodological brief; host investigator webinar.

risks.description: Real-time EDC integration may exceed latency tolerance.
risks.mitigation: Implement local cache; async update strategy.

risks.description: Clinical teams unfamiliar with adaptive dose-escalation.
risks.mitigation: Develop training modules; include adaptive cohorts in SOP.

achievements.summary: Completed statistical simulation demonstrating 22 % fewer DLTs in silico.
Secured endorsement from Oncology TA Head for pilot use.
Drafted protocol template incorporating adaptive algorithm hooks.

deliverables.description: Pilot trial design ready for IRB submission
